summary: The 'Same Care, Lower Cost Act' aims to amend the Social Security Act to align Medicare fee-for-service payment rates across different ambulatory settings (hospital outpatient departments, ambulatory surgical centers, etc.). The bill mandates site-neutral payments for certain services furnished in these settings, starting in 2027, based on classifications determined by the Secretary, taking into consideration recommendations from the Medicare Payment Advisory Commission.  It also includes conforming amendments to update relevant sections of the Social Security Act.
